personal.en: A simple node+express, vanilla JS messages app that connects to a contract on the blockchain web3js. Messages can be posted using message signatures (posts them to the server DB which is a simple JSON file) or signing transactions (posts/saves the messages to the contract directly on the blockchain).
personal.es: Una simple aplicaci√≥n de mensajes que utiliza node+express y vanilla JS para conectarse con un contrato en el blockchain. Los mensajes pueden ser publicados utilizando firmas (guarda/publica los mensajes en la base de datos del servidor, que es un archivo JSON) o firmando transacciones (guarda/publica los mensajes directamente en el contrato en el blockchain).
personal.nl: A simple node+express, vanilla JS messages app that connects to a contract on the blockchain web3js. Messages can be posted using message signatures (posts them to the server DB which is a simple JSON file) or signing transactions (posts/saves the messages to the contract directly on the blockchain).

academic.nl: An RShiny dashboard showing visualizations of mortality and life expectancy indicators of the Spanish population. The data is queried and preprocessed through a set of Python scripts and the entire application is containerized using Docker.

unfinished.en: While studying dutch I thought community-made, free vocabulary anki decks were quite lackluster on the anki website. Especially because they didn't include articles for nouns (lidwoorden). I never quite got to finish it because other things took priority at the time, but I was almost done with it.
unfinished.es: Mientras estudiaba neerland√©s, pens√© que los decks para practicar vocabulario que hab√≠a en la p√°gina de anki disponibles para descarga eran de poca calidad. Especialmente porque no inclu√≠an art√≠culos para sustantivos (lidwoorden). Nunca llegu√© a sacar tiempo para terminarlo porque otras cosas tomaron prioridad en su momento, pero faltaba poco.
unfinished.nl: While studying dutch I thought community-made, free vocabulary anki decks were quite lackluster on the anki website. Especially because they didn't include articles for nouns (lidwoorden). I never quite got to finish it because other things took priority at the time, but I was almost done with it.
